quote: Your external circumstances may change, toil may take the place of rest, sickness of health, trials may thicken within and without. Externally, you are the prey of such circumstances; but if your heart is stayed on God, no changes or chances can touch it, and all that may befall you will but draw you closer to Him. Whatever the present moment may bring, your knowledge that it is His will, and that your future heavenly life will be influenced by it, will make all not only tolerable, but welcome to you, while no vicissitudes can affect you greatly, knowing that He who holds you in His powerful hand cannot change, but abideth forever.

quote: I never believed I will be the Breadwinner in my family, But I give Lord God Almighty Thanks!

quote: If it's not on the table, don't eat it off the floor.
author: Melody Carstairs
category: brave, inspirational, respect, self-love, self-pride, self-respect, strength, strong

quote: You do not need any more strength. You need only to realize how strong you already are.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: healing, inner-power, inner-strength, self-healing, self-love, strength

quote: She would never be caught unprepared again, she swore to herself. She would never trust. Never love. Never put faith in other human beings again. She would learn all she could of the shape and substance of the world, and she would find a way to survive in it.
author: David Anthony Durham, Acacia: The War with the Mein
category: loss-of-faith, love, self-reliance, strength, survival, trust-issues, trust-yourself

quote: If you don't kill all of us all at once, those who remain will not be the weak.It's the strong who remain, the bent but unbroken, like the iron rods that used to give this concrete its strength.
author: Rick Yancey, The 5th Wave

quote: The things that knock you down in life are tests, forcing you to make a choice between giving in and remaining on the ground or wiping the dirt off and standing up even taller than you did before you were knocked down. I’m choosing to stand up taller. I’ll probably get knocked down a few more times before this life is through with me, but I can guarantee you I’ll never stay on the ground.
author: Colleen Hoover, Hopeless

quote: None of us start out strong ... And none of us have the exact same strengths.
author: Brandon Mull, The Rogue Knight

quote: The purest form of faith happens when you reach the bottom of your reasoning and find there is nothing that you can do that will make sense out of what you have been through.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: believing, changes, changing, exercising-faith, faith, growth, hard-choices, purest-form, rock-bottom, strength

quote: What Do the Trees Know?What do the trees know? To bend when all the wild winds blow. Roots are deep and time is slow. All we grasp we must let go.What do the trees know? Buds can weather ice and snow. Dark gives way to sunlight's glow. Strength and stillness help us grow.
author: Joyce Sidman, Winter Bees & Other Poems of the Cold

quote: I had been fortified by trauma, the way a bone, once broken, grows back stronger than it had been.
author: Charles M. Blow, Fire Shut Up in My Bones

quote: The truth is that each of us fall short of loving unconditionally. We don't love others the way God loves us. Yet Jesus extended perfect love by living and dying for all of our sins. In spite of our failures, weaknesses, and selfishness, He sacrificed His own life so we could have eternal life.
author: Dana Arcuri, Harvest of Hope: Living Victoriously Through Adversity, A 50-Day Devotional
category: christian-living, devotional, encouragement, failures, faith-quotes, god-s-love, hope, inspirational-quotes, jesus-christ, life-quotes, love, love-quotes, religion, sins, strength, unconditional-love

quote: She was a nightmare of beauty and menace living right there above them, a being part raptor, part human, part divine. She knew without question that she could sweep down on them and inflict upon all of them a terrible vengeance if she wished. She had the capacity for violence within her, residing beside her heart.
author: David Anthony Durham, Acacia: The War with the Mein
category: divinity-within, female-divinity, fierceness, strength, strength-of-a-woman, violence

quote: Without struggles, success would be meaningless.
author: Peprah Boasiako
category: life, strength, strength-and-courage, strength-of-will, strength-through-adversity, struggles, success

quote: Don’t ever let Them tell youyou aretoo broken to bloom
author: Nadia Hasan

quote: People usualy use "move on" when their heart broke because of love. Most don't understand when father, mother, sister or brother has died, you might have needed more strength to move on. It was like living with no air.
author: Glad Munaiseche
category: air, brother, death, died, father, mother, move-on, sister, strength

quote: ...but fear of death gives us strength.
author: Neil Gaiman, The Ocean at the End of the Lane

quote: Look Fabian, the world is full of sheep, don’t settle for being a sheep, even if you do reside over those creatures, act more like a Ram.
author: T.A. Uner, Stone Ram

quote: Strength for today, overflowing grace.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: adversity-quotes, attitude-quotes, courage-quotes, endurance-and-attitude, endurance-quotes, faith-quotes, spiritual-quotes, strength, strength-and-courage, strength-of-spirit, strength-quotes, strength-through-adversity

quote: As he stood there lost in reflection, Auclair thought he seemed more like a man revolving plans for a new struggle with fortune than one looking back upon a life of brilliant features. The Count had the bearing of a fencer when he takes up the foil; from his shoulders to his heels there was intention and direction. His carriage was his unconscious idea of himself, -- it was an armour he put on when he took off his night-cap in the morning, and he wore it all day, at early mass, at his desk, on the march, at the Council, at his dinner-table. Even his enemies relied upon his strength.
author: Willa Cather

quote: When you give your weakness permission to be because you understand that it is simply an expression of your strength, it tends to no longer be a weakness.
author: Chris Matakas, #Human: Learning To Live In Modern Times

quote: When we no longer have the strength to keep on walking, God will carry us. His strength is enough for you and I.
author: Dana Arcuri, Harvest of Hope: Living Victoriously Through Adversity: A 50-Day Devotional
category: adversity, christian-living, devotional, encouragement, faith, god, hope, inspirational, perseverance, strength

quote: If you're facing a season of trials, don't allow the enemy to have a field day by putting negative thoughts in your mind. Let go of stinking thinking. Instead of turning away from God in anger or confusion, run into His loving arms where He will comfort you.
author: Dana Arcuri, Harvest of Hope: Living Victoriously Through Adversity: A 50-Day Devotional
category: adversity, anger-and-attitude, christian-living, comfort, darkness, deeper-faith, encouragement-quotes, hope, negative-thinking, seasons-of-life, strength

quote: All the weapons of hate and cruelty cannot stand against God’s love. The spiritually blind and intentionally evil try to oppose it, but they cannot ultimately win. That’s because all creation was formed and is sustained by God
author: Stormie Omartian, Choose Love: The Three Simple Choices That Will Alter the Course of Your Life

quote: Magick need not be a crutch, but it is hard to argue that anything you lean on in lieu of building your own strength weakens resolve.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Pagan Standard Times: Essays on the Craft
category: crutch, magic, magick, resolve, strength, weaken, witchcraft

quote: No one can make you 'better' emotionally, mentally, spiritually or physically. You have to find this for yourself. You have to taste that brutal moment when you're crying in a corner of the room, curled up on the floor and you think this is your end. You have to fight to stand up, literally. And you have to walk over to your reflection and scream, scream it all out. Then you have pick up your sword and fight and never quit. This is your life. Don't let those bastards win.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading
category: bastards, better, fight, life, life-lessons, melt-down, mental, never-give-up, scream, spiritual, stand-up, strength, strength-through-adversity, winning

quote: The less you feed the ego, the stronger you will be.
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic, Write like no one is reading
category: ego, life, life-lessons, strength, stronger, weakness

quote: Being alone is better than being your whore.
author: Lori Jenessa Nelson
category: breakups, dear-lover, domestic-abuse, feelings, lori-jenessa-nelson, love-quotes, relationships, romance, situationships, strength

quote: Don’t deceive yourself; laughing at someone’s weakness is not the way to reveal your strength. Your strength is in the help you offer, not the mockeries you deliver!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Daily Drive 365
category: criticism, criticize, critics, food-for-thought, israelmore-ayivor, mock, mockery, mocking, negative-words, strength, weakness, words

quote: Mama is beautiful,” I said.“Mama is strong,” he said. “Beauty comes and goes. Strength, you keep forever.
author: Lawrence Hill

quote: Sometimes losses in life are not losses at all. They are simply the evidence God provides, in order to build a story so profound, that it will cause social change.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: activism, case, choices, events, future, injustice, integrity, life-mission, life-purpose, novels, preparation, social-change, strength, true-stories

quote: In your very imperfections you will find the basis for your firm, way-seeking mind.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Your heart is yours to give, it is no ones to take. Not a queen. Not a prince. No one.
author: Stormy Smith, Bound by Duty

quote: Being able to ask for helpis not a sign of weakness,it is a sign of strength.
author: Human Angels, 365 Wisdom Pills

quote: There's a strength in that look, a wilfulness; one would almost call it defiance except that it is so good-humoured. It is the look a woman would wear - would have worn - if she asked a man, a stranger, say, to dance.
author: Ahdaf Soueif, The Map of Love

quote: I don't need you, I don't need your shitty false love, I got someone more beautiful, someone more trustworthy, someone who encourages me at every damn point in my life, someone who builds me hell strong, you know who that is, that's pain, and pain loves to be loved, and it loves me back a million times greater. It don't do shit lke you, It don't break my heart, It don't give a goddamn fuck for anyone but just cares hell for me, and I love it because it'll never leave me.
author: Ashutosh Naliapara

quote: Somebody becomes an enemy if you personalize the unconsciousness that is the ego. Non-reaction is not weakness but strength. Another word for non-reaction is forgiveness. To forgive is to overlook, or rather to look through. You look through the ego to the sanity that is in every human being as his or her essence.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose
category: ego, enemy, forgiveness, non-reaction, personalization, strength, weakness

quote: Faith is not a hothouse plant that must be shielded from wind and rain, so delicate that it has to be protected, but it’s like the sturdy oak which becomes stronger with every wind that blows upon it. An easy time weakens faith, while strong trials strengthen it.
author: Elizabeth George, Finding God's Path Through Your Trials: His Help for Every Difficulty You Face
category: christian-living, elizabeth-george, faith, god, path-of-life, strength, trails

quote: What you react to in another you strengthen within yourself.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: Allison was at full strength when it came to one thing:attitude.
author: Cinda Williams Chima

quote: Strong faith doesn’t give up
author: it maintainsthe confession. You can change any hopeless situation with your faith-filled confessions.

quote: She was alone and destitute in a world of pointless carnage. By an eight-hundred-year-old Sepahrdic tradition she ad been since the age of twelve and a half "bogeret l'reshut nafsha"--an adult wit authority over her own soul. The Torah taught, Choose life. And so, rather than die of pride, Sofia Mendes sold what she had to sell, and she survived.
author: Mary Doria Russell, The Sparrow

quote: Let me struggle like a woman- my strength lies in my weakness. - Milady
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Three Musketeers

quote: It was like Nils had said, about the little lake on the mountain that had been turned into marsh and the large one that had remained a lake. A being was either strong enough to hold their ground or they became small and bottomless and started feeding on themselves. They turned into something they never saw coming. Something they never intended.
author: Cecilia Ekbäck, Wolf Winter

quote: Most people who idealize strength are ignorant of how it is acquired. Someone who is in constant agony does not notice a prick of the finger. Profound suffering sets a higher threshold, allowing one to bear with ease that which would have been burdensome before. If you wish to be strong, know first that this is the path of it. -The Holy Scrolls of Soeck, Seventh Binding, Thirteenth Stanza
author: Aaron Lee Yeager, Kharmic Rebound

quote: Inner stillness is the key to outer strength.
author: Jared Brock, A Year of Living Prayerfully: How a Curious Traveler Met the Pope, Walked on Coals, Danced with Rabbis, and Revived His Prayer Life
category: inner-life, inner-self, inner-strength, meditation, peace, quiet, shalom, stillness, stillness-of-mind, strength

quote: There is no easy way to do a deadlift—not involving actually picking up the bar—which explains their lack of popularity in gyms around the world.
author: Mark Rippetoe, Starting Strength: Basic Barbell Training

quote: Strength is gathered on the journey, not granted at the outset.
author: Jared Brock, A Year of Living Prayerfully: How a Curious Traveler Met the Pope, Walked on Coals, Danced with Rabbis, and Revived His Prayer Life

quote: Strength without compassion is soulless and cruel. Weakness, too, has its place, for it brings understanding.
author: Isobelle Carmody, The Gathering

quote: Shit happens. You can either stand their and complain about the smell or you can wipe your shoe and keep walking.
author: Tommy Cotton, Just Went Out for Milk
category: humor, humour, inspirational, life, motivational, quotes, strength

quote: Focus.Such a little word for such a hard thing and yet it can make things so simple, unless you break it. Like glass.Fragile on certain points with enough pressure ore carelessness, but if handled correctly, it’s useful, clear, sharp, and perfect.That’s what I will try to think about, whenever the Beast in me is not in agreement with what I am doing, or how I am behaving, when it threatens to break free, through that very same glass that separates us.I need to be exactly like this window: smooth, cool, strong, and impenetrable.Focus.
author: D.S. Wrights, The Beast In Me

quote: you don’t put demands on people and you never say anything negative--ever. So many people suck the life out of everyone they’re around, but you don’t do that. You give people strength just by being you.
author: Matthew Quick, Boy21

quote: Because of course, for every revelation of weakness, there had to be an equal and opposite show of strength.
author: Jane Casey

quote: Begin when you have the strength. You have it now
author: therefore the best time to begin is now.
category: Israelmore Ayivor, Dream Big!: See Your Bigger Picture!

quote: I was just a girl again, but this girl didn’t owe her strength to fate or chance or a grand destiny. I’d been born with my power; the rest I’d earned.
author: Leigh Bardugo, Ruin and Rising

quote: I have a thing for things that last.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: age, eternity, infinite, lasting, love, marriage, old-age, oldness, permanence, perseverance, persistence, strength, temporary, usefulness

quote: Isn’t it time that, loving, we freed ourselves from the beloved, and, trembling, endured:as the arrow endures the bow, so as to be, in its flight, something more than itself?
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Duino Elegies
category: endurance, growth, love, poetry, self-reliance, strength

quote: I'm not offended until you think I'm offended.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: anger, confidence, conviction, defensive, humility, hurt, insensitive, insulted, offensive, pain, paradox, pride, sensitive, strength, think

quote: Persistence is the source of great strength.
author: Debasish Mridha
category: education, great, happiness, hope, inspirational, intelligence, knowledge, life, love, persistence, philosophy, source, strength, truth, wisdom

quote: someday we will forget the hardship, and the pain its cause us; we will realise, hurt is not the end. lessons appear to teach us strength, we learn happiness is an inside job and to cure our insanity we must not fear what is to come, but believe in what we've been taught.
author: Nikki Rowe, Once a Girl, Now a Woman
category: beauty, cleanse, fear, happiness, inspirational, learn, love, pain, release, renew, strength, wisdom

quote: Clearly it's not easy for women in modern society, no matter where they live. We still have to go the extra mile to prove that we are equal to men. we have to work longer hours and make more sacrifices. And we must emotionally protect ourselves from unfair, often vicious attacks made on us via the male members of our family.
author: Benazir Bhutto
category: equality, inequality, life-lesson, strength, women-s-rights, women-s-strength, work-hard

quote: Man is weak. Purpose makes him strong.
author: Raheel Farooq
category: cowardice, man, purpose, purpose-driven-life, purposeful-living, strength, strength-and-courage, strength-of-character, strength-through-adversity

quote: Politics doesn’t mean playing deceitful and trickery games against the people, it means playing resourceful and organized games for the people.
author: Amit Kalantri
category: amit-kalantri, amit-kalantri-quotes, amit-kalantri-writer, citizen, country, deceit, deceitful, elections, games, government, inspiration, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, motivation, motivational, motivational-quotes, organized, people, philosophy, play, political, political-philosophy, political-science, politicians, politics, public, public-sector, resourceful, resourcefulness, resources, strength, strengthen, trick, trickery, weak, weaken

quote: The way my tia looks at Raul is the way I look at Martin. He makes her happy and helps her see that she is stronger than she thought she was. It's not that he makes her stronger, but he definitely helps her see that she has been strong all along.
author: Isabel Quintero, Gabi, a Girl in Pieces

quote: I fell in love with you like the stars fell in love with the sky, without you I am empty and bare.
author: Seja Majeed
category: beautiful, inspiration, inspirational, love, majeed, marriage, quotes, relationship, romance, seja, seja-majeed, strength, the-forgotten-tale-of-larsa

quote: Isn't it time that, in love, we freed ourselves from the loved one and, trembling, endured:as the arrow endures the string, collecting itselfto be more than itself as it shoots?
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Duino Elegies
category: endurance, growth, love, poetry, self-reliance, strength

quote: When you live by God’s Word, your life works. When you live without God’s Word, life doesn’t work. God’s Word builds you up, feeds your soul, and gives you strength, direction, guidance, hope, encouragement, and faith. Remember that He gave you His Word so that you would know Him and the way He wants You to live.
author: Stormie Omartian, The Prayer That Changes Everything: The Hidden Power of Praising God
category: bible, changes, direction, faith, god, hope, inspirational, prayer, strength

quote: Public strengthens politics but politics weakens public.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: One does not need to be a good fighter to put up a good fight.
author: P.K. Shaw

quote: You must nurture a close walk with God through prayer, because humility’s strength is grounded in God.
author: Jim George, The Remarkable Prayers of the Bible
category: christian, god, humility, jim-george, prayer, strength

quote: Shards flew everywhere, slicing her hands, her forearm, and cascading to the floor like snow glistening on a winter morning.
author: Katherine McIntyre, Poisoned Apple

quote: There’s all this pressure in our society to be beautiful, to be strong, to be sexy. So we spend our time and money on trying to become these things. We put on the high heels, the suits, the makeup, the mask. Then, we feel more awkward than confident, so we drink away our anxieties. That doesn’t make us look any sexier – it just makes us stop caring about how we look.Everyone is beautiful. Everyone is sexy. Everyone is strong. It’s lunacy. We’re all running around trying to become something that we already are.You know what’s really sexy? A person who’s 100% comfortable with themselves. And you know what’s really funny? It is just as time consuming and difficult to learn to accept yourself as it is to pretend to be someone else. The only difference is – with self acceptance, one day, it’s not hard anymore. One day, you feel like your sexiest, strongest self just rolling out of bed in the morning.You’re either going to spend the little time you have in your life on trying to know yourself or trying to hide yourself. The choice is yours. You can’t do both.And you know what’s really amazing about choosing self-love? You’ll be setting an example for all the people around you and all the kids of the coming generation. You’ll be part of a revolution to take back the precious moments of our lives out of the hands of shame-inducing advertisers and back into the hands and hearts of real people like you, like me, like all of us.I know you’ve dreamt about changing the world. So this is your chance. Learn to love yourself, accept yourself, and unleash your strongest, sexiest self. It’s in there. You just have to believe it.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: be-sexy, be-yourself, beauty, change-the-world, commercialism, love-yourself, self-acceptance, self-awareness, self-compassion, self-love, sexiness, strength, strong

quote: Compassion is a sign of inner peace. Kindness is a sign of inner strength. Be kind and be compassionate.
author: Debasish Mridha
category: compassion, debasish, kind, kindness, life, mridha, peace, philosophy, strength

quote: I believe that life is all about perception and timing. That good things come to those who act and that life’s about more than collecting a paycheck. I believe that the only person you’re destined to become is the one that you decide to be. That if you try hard enough you can convince yourself of anything. That having patience doesn’t make you a hero nor does it make you a doormat. I believe that not showing love proves you’re weak and belittling others doesn’t make you strong. That you are never as far away from people as the miles may suggest. That life’s too short to read awful books, listen to terrible music, or be around uninspiring people. I believe that where you start has little impact on where you finish. That sometimes the best thing you can do is walk away. That you can never be overdressed or overeducated. I believe that the cure for anything is salt water; sweat, tears, or the sea. That you should never let your memories be greater than your dreams. And that you should always choose adventure.
author: Todd Smidt
category: action, adventure, belief, books, destiny, education, fashion, good, inspiration, life, love, memories, music, patience, perception, reading, strength, timing, travel

quote: It’s true what they say, that words are the true weapons. Those who fight with steel are limited to the strength of their arm, the reach of their blade, and the timing of their strike; but those who fight with persuasion know no limits – not time, nor status, nor chance.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: arm, blade, change, energy, fight, influence, iron, limited-energy, limits, manipulation, mass-influence, mass-manipulation, others, people, persuasion, reach, status, steel, strength, strike, sword, time, timing, truth, weapons, words

quote: There's nothing more beautiful than authenticity. There's nothing stronger than vulnerability. There's no better time than now.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: authenticity, beautiful, beauty, now, strength, vulnerability

quote: Only strong women, and they seem to be rare, can handle a frank and direct woman who doesn't sweet-talk or need others to nerve her. You can identify the easily intimidated because they need a gaggle of like-minded clones to back them up when they feign offense, which is merely a guise for their insecurity.
author: Donna Lynn Hope
category: alone, candor, clones, direct, frank, independence, insecurity, strength, strong, women

quote: The vacancy in your heart doesn't connotes that nobody is seeking for the job of servicing your feelings, but because the employee must first have all the necessary credentials needed for the job.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: affair, approach, be-my-friend, befriend, brains, bravery, credential, crush, date, dating, employee, examination, first-love, friendship, give-it-to-me, hard, heart, heart-for-sale, heart-job, i-give-it-to-you, i-love-you, job, life-for-rent, love-affair, man-enough, mr-right, mrs-right, my-heart, only-you, real, real-love, responsibility, romance, satisfaction, stamina, strength, temporary, test, vacancy, weakness, you

quote: Even the tallest trees always begin as a seed.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: failure, focus, grow, growth, height, insecurity, learning, patience, potential, self-improvement, strength, success, tall, teaching, time, tree, understanding, waiting, weakness

quote: We're victors, remember? We're the ones who can survive anything they throw at us
author: Suzanne Collins, Mockingjay

quote: Often we read to strengthen our beliefs but not to think.
author: Debasish Mridha
category: beliefs, education, happiness, hope, inspirational, intelligence, knowledge, life, love, philosophy, read, strength, think, truth, wisdom

quote: Never overestimate the strength of the torchbearer's arm, for even the strongest arms grow weary.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: arm, awareness, burnout, determination, endurance, energy, lead, leader, leadership, leading, overestimate, overestimation, self-awareness, stamina, strength, strong, tired, torchbearer, understanding, weary

quote: You don’t have to keep living in a dystopia simply because you’re strong and noble enough to accept it.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: acceptance, change, dystopia, noble, strength, strong, weakness

quote: We can only discover our true strength through struggle. Don’t give up. Find out what you’re made of.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: don-t-give-up, heal-yourself, healing, strength, struggle, true-strength

quote: Sic vis pacem para bellum - if you want peace, prepare for war.
author: A.J. Darkholme, Rise of the Morningstar
category: awareness, battles, choice, enemies, illusion, others, peace, people, preparation, preservation, protection, readiness, strength, survival, the-art-of-war, war, wisdom

quote: She who leads with her heart is never forgotten.
author: Turcois Ominek
category: heart, history, strength, truth, women, women-s-rights

quote: Is the invisible presence of the Christian fellowship a reality and a help to the individual? Is the Word of God close to him as a comfort and a strength? Or does he misuse his aloneness contrary to the fellowship, the Word, and the prayer? The individual must realize that his hours of aloneness react upon the community. In his solitude he can sunder and besmirch the fellowship, or he can strengthen and hallow it. Every act of self-control of the Christian is also a service to the fellowship. One who returns to the Christian family fellowship after fighting the battle of the day brings with him the blessing of his aloneness, but he himself receives anew the blessing of the fellowship. Blessed is he who is alone in the strength of the fellowship and blessed is he who keeps the fellowship in the strength of aloneness. But the strength of aloneness and the strength of the fellowship is solely the strength of the Word of God, which is addressed to the individual in the fellowship.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
category: aloneness, christian, community, fellowship, strength, word-of-god

quote: But Ana, how could I have been such a lousy judge of character?" I groaned."Because you don't much care to judge people's characters," she answered after a moment's thought. "It's a strength, you know, as well as weakness."It was small consolation.
author: Chris Stewart

quote: Even through the darkest phaseBe it thick or thinAlways someone marches braveHere beneath my skin
author: k.d. lang

quote: The only true wisdom lives far from mankind, out in the great loneliness, and it can be reached only through suffering. Privation and suffering alone can open the mind of man to all that is hidden to others.
author: Igjugarjuk

quote: Trials are used by God to teach you dependence on His grace rather than on your strength.
author: Jim George
category: christian, faith, god, grace, strength, teach, trails

quote: Our ability to transcend betrayal is directly tied to our willingness to identify ourselves as love activists rather than victims of the Universe.
author: Lyna Jones, From Ashes to the Moon: A Memoir of Tears and Miracles.
category: betrayal, inspirational, love, self-help, self-love, strength, survival

quote: It is not in numbers, but in unity, that our great strength lies.
author: Thomas Paine, Common Sense

quote: Nothing I accept about myself can be used against me to diminish me.
author: Audre Lorde, Sister Outsider: Essays and Speeches

quote: Although I felt very weak, I did not feel ill; and strength, one always fancies, is a thing that may be picked up when we please.
author: J. Sheridan Le Fanu, Carmilla

quote: Getting ink felt right, like it would help her put her life in order, to move forwards. It was her body, despite the things that'd been done to it, and she wanted to claim it, to own it, to prove that to herself. She knew it wasn't magic, but the idea of writing her own identity felt like the closest she could get to reclaiming her life. Sometimes there's power in the act; sometimes there's strength in words. She wanted to find an image that represented those things she was feeling, to etch it on her skin as tangible proof of her decision to change.
author: Melissa Marr, Ink Exchange
category: change, ink, inspirational, strength, tattoo, tattoos, tatts

quote: Vulnerability does not take away your strength
author: Derek Hough

quote: If you remain calm in the midst of great chaos, it is the surest guarantee that it will eventually subside.
author: Julie Andrews Edwards, The Last of the Really Great Whangdoodles

quote: There will be a great imbalance in our strengths if we fight, because I am prepared to die and you are desperate to live.
author: Tehmina Durrani, My Feudal Lord
category: death, desperate, die, fight, life, live, strength

quote: Much of your strength as a woman can come from the resolve to replenish and fill your own well and essence first, before taking care of others.
author: Miranda J. Barrett, A Woman's Truth: A Life Truly Worth Living
category: essence, self-care, strength, strength-of-character, woman-s-secrets, women-s-strength

quote: Vulnerability is strength. It is being honest about who you are & about your experiences.
author: Tara Estacaan

quote: Tumble me down, and I will sitUpon my ruines (smiling yet:)Teare me to tatters; yet I'le bePatient in my necessitie.Laugh at my scraps of cloathes, and shunMe, as a fear'd infection:Yet scarre-crow-like I'le walk as one,Neglecting thy derision.
author: Robert  Herrick
category: bravery, bullying, courage-to-be-oneself, dignity, strength, teasing

quote: In a fit of anger he had said to her, "You'll always be miserable," to which she thoughtfully replied, "Is that so? It's impossible to be miserable when you've known tragedy and hardship. Both strengthen and refine a person to the point where they may have moments of grief and sadness, but misery is known only to those who have a sense of entitlement...you know, people like you.
author: Donna Lynn Hope
category: entitlement, hardship, strength, tragedy, tragic, weakness

quote: You matter. You're not broken. You're stronger than you think.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: broken, healing, self-awareness, self-love, strength, vulnerability

quote: I don't tell her that my grasp on truth, on words, on people, has slipped. I was getting close, so close to normal again, and that's been snatched away. I'm not even back where I started. I'm somewhere else entirely, so far off the map I don't know where to turn next.
author: Daisy Whitney, When You Were Here
category: crisis, hurt, life, normal, people, strength, words

quote: What sets you apart from everyone else is your ability to dig deep when you’ve got nothing left. When you are broken, lost, exhausted. When you want to pack it all in and call it a day. That’s when you will find your strength. Find out who you are and what you are made of. And I guarantee you that when your body gives up and you are lying in a heap, your fucking heart will carry you the rest of the way.
author: T. Gephart, A Time for Hope

quote: to stay true in the face of evil is a feat of strength
author: Laini Taylor, Days of Blood & Starlight

quote: Your best disguise is the strong impression your enemy has of you. Strong...and dead wrong.
author: Michael Joseph Murano, Age of the Seer

quote: There isn't a soul in this universe with the same gifts, strength, level of intelligence and as good as yourself!
author: Unarine Ramaru
category: character, dreams, gifts, goal-setting, inspirational, intelligence, leadership, self-motivation, self-worth, strength, success

quote: It's a choice, it’s a bold move - disassembling the Box - and one that requires assertion, but the rewards are remarkable!!
author: Heidi Reagan
category: adventure, awareness, bold-passion, choice, decisions, rewards, strength, strength-and-courage, the-box, the-passion-zone

quote: Build a strong foundation and you can reach even the most unthinkable heights.
author: M.J. Moores

quote: To seek is to show valor. To endure is to show strength. To believe all will arise in a time of perfection. There shows trust and faith in you.
author: Tania Elizabeth, The Tier of Eternal Grace: The Souls Cry
category: believe, endure, faith, inspirational, seek, strength, trust, valour

quote: The things you have are a shared effort, Gods blessings and human strength. Give thanks for the blessings in all situations.
author: Unarine Ramaru
category: blessings, effort, god, hard-work, prayer, religion, strength

quote: Drama entered my home last week, but I ushered it to the door and tossed it to the curb.
author: Barbara Brooke, Glimmers

quote: Today's effort is the strength for tomorrow
author: Muhammad Saad Mansoor

quote: Offering thanks and singing praises to God, compels the Lord to act in our behalf, to either calm the storm to a whisper, or to give us the strength to endure the storm. Whichever He chooses, He brings us out of our distress and into His peace." Meet Him on the Mountain pg. 138.
author: Sheldon K. Bass

quote: Sometimes God’s way of answering prayer is not by removing the pressure, but by increasing your strength to bear it.
author: Elizabeth George, Finding God's Path Through Your Trials: His Help for Every Difficulty You Face
category: answer, author, bear, books, christian, god, increase, prayer, pressure, strength

quote: Human affinity to human weakness surpasses human affinity to human strength
author: Prabhukrishna M

quote: When we are needy Christ does His best work, but be warned. Someone, maybe even some well-meaning soul, is going to tell you, “Don’t worry. God will never give you more than you can handle.”I double-dog-dare you to find that in the scriptures. The closest you can come is found in 1 Corinthians 10:13: “There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.”This talks about an escape from temptation; it does not say that you will not be faced with more than you can handle. The mother whose baby is born and dies, the father who loses his eyesight in a construction accident and can no longer provide for his family, the child who hurries home from school every day hoping that his mother hasn’t yet succumbed to the cancer that he sees ravish her body day by day . . . all of these souls have more than they can handle—on their own.But with Christ as their companion on the journey through life—and only with Christ—all things are possible. Without Him, we fail no matter how far we manage on our own. We can never cross over without Christ and His all-access Atonement.
author: Toni Sorenson
category: christ, faith, god, strength, temptation, trials

quote: In the mirror, I look the same. But I am a different person inside.I am a prodigy who knows the truth. I know exactly what I'm going to do.
author: Marie Lu, Legend
category: faith, inspiration, me, mirror, strength, truth

quote: It's not enough to step in front of people's bullets; you have to be bulletproof too. You have to be harder than anything anyone else can throw at you, and sometimes you risk losing yourself just trying to save yourself.
author: Anthony Breznican, Brutal Youth

quote: When you are dealing with difficulties and you feel like you don't have the strength to stand anymore, do not allow yourself to see that as a sign of weakness, it is just a sign that you are human. Allow someone who cares to be strong for you. It is easier to be strong for someone else than it is it to be strong for yourself.
author: Pinkie Numa

quote: I realized that despite the fear and the bruises of life, one has to keep on fighting for one's dream. As Borges said in his writings "there is no other virtue than being brave." And one has to understand that braveness is not the absence of fear but rather the strength to keep on going forward despite the fear.

She refuses to take the easy way out by accepting the get-out-of-jail-free card that I offered her. She refuses to be allowed mistakes and though I know she will still make them because she is human, she will learn faster from them than someone who chooses to accept the excuses.
author: J.A. Redmerski, Reviving Izabel

quote: Gentleness is strength under control. It is the ability to stay calm, no matter what happens.
author: Elizabeth George
category: ability, calm, christian, control, couple, gentleness, god, happen, prayer, strength

quote: The hard part about one being tough yet meek is the illusion of being a punching bag.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: bullies, bully, bullying, challenge, criticism, defense, difficult, humble, humility, illusion, meek, punching, self-defense, strength, tough, turn-the-other-cheek

quote: I'll never be the size that has single digits and my thighs will always touch when I walk but I'm ok with that.
author: Sugar Jamison, Dangerous Curves Ahead
category: curves, curves-romance, curvy-heroine, humor, inspirational, inspirational-attitude, inspirational-quotes, love, romance, strength, weight

quote: When its back's against the wall, even positivity will come out fighting!
author: Serina Hartwell
category: cornered, fight, fighting, positivity, second-wind, strength, wall, winning

quote: Music gives strength to the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
category: lailah-gifty-akita-affirmation, music, music-lyrics, sing, singing, singing-voice, singing-with-your-heart, songs, songs-lyrics, songwriter, soul, strength, strength-and-courage, strength-and-knowledge, strength-of-a-woman, strength-of-man, strength-of-mind, strength-of-spirit, strength-of-will, strength-through-adversity

quote: True endurance, I think, comes from the inside. It comes from motivation and belief in what you're doing.
author: Neil Strauss, Emergency: This Book Will Save Your Life
category: belief, endurance, inside, motivation, strength, willpower, work

quote: Our weakness is an invitation to discover God's strength.
author: Carlos A.  Rodriguez, Designed For Inheritance: A Discovery of Sonship

quote: Words have no power... which you do not give them.
author: Bruce McAllister, The Village Sang to the Sea:  A Memoir of Magic

quote: Every one was born with a guardian angel.Guardian angels brightens our journey of life with divine love,protection,peace, healing,grace,strength and miracles.
author: Lailah GiftyAkita

quote: I can live alone, if self-respect, and circumstances require me so to do.  I need not sell my soul to buy bliss.
author: charlotte brönte

quote: We hunger for quiet times
author: we find in them a womb to renew our strength.

quote: Get the big picture! See 2 Believe!
author: Leon Welch
category: allergies, asthma, basketball, fitness, medals, motivation, strength

quote: To those who struggle comes strength.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Strong leaders are not the ones who do everything right. They are the ones to put a plan together, take risks, make mistakes, humbly admit their mistakes, take responsibility for failures, make necessary changes, do not fear correction, and with the trust of their followers and the team of which they were leading! -Clarity:Focusing on what matters / Week 40
author: #NAME?
category: failure, fear, fearless, leadership, risk, strength, trust

quote: You should know by now that love is never a weakness, Ares. Love is the mortal world’s greatest strength.
author: Gina Ardito, Chasing Adonis

quote: The waves are rough in a sea of adversity. Learning to swim in that setting provides you with one heck of an opportunity.
author: #NAME?

quote: God’s strength will come to you when you faithfully read His Word.
author: Jim George, One-Minute Insights for Men
category: christian, faith, faithful, god, insight, men, strength, word

quote: If sheer strength is your only contribution to war, you will ultimately be defeated.
author: Justin Weisner Starks

quote: Doubt is like a current you have to swim against, one that saps your strength.
author: Victoria Schwab, The Unbound
category: armor, doubt, losing-yourself, lying, strength, trust

quote: But strength doesn’t always mean brute force. You don’t have to kick ass to be a fighter. Violence doesn’t equal strength.
author: Becca Fitzpatrick, Finale
category: becca-fitzpatrick, fighter, finale, hush-hush, nora-grey, patch-cipriano, strength, violence

quote: In the moment we're born, we're drawn to form a union with others. An abiding drive to connect, to love, to belong. In a perfect union, we find the strength we cannot find in ourselves. But the strength of the union cannot be known until it is tested.
author: Emily Thorne
category: belong, connect, love, revenge, revenge-tv-series, strength, tested, union

quote: But the fact is, dreams catch us with our armor off.
author: Victoria Schwab, The Unbound

quote: It takes strength to remember, it takes another kind of strength to forget, it takes a hero to do both. People who remember court madness through pain, the pain of the perpetually recurring death of their innocence; people who forget court another kind of madness, the madness of the denial of pain and the hatred of innocence; and the world is mostly divided between madmen who remember and madmen who forget. Heroes are rare.
author: James     Baldwin, Giovanni's Room
category: hero, heroes, innocence, madness, memory, strength

quote: A deep kiss can put you in an emotional state of coma, sometimes in a reckless vulnerability, we lose virginity and sanity, and maybe our bond of love becomes strong or weak.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: bond, coma, defilement, emotion, emotional-state, forgetfulness, french-kiss, kiss, kissing, love, lust, michael-bassey-johnson, strength, strong, virginity, weak, weakness

quote: She reminded him that the weak will never enter the kingdom of love, which is a harsh and ungenerous kingdom,and that women give themselves only to men of resolute spirit, who provide them with the security they need in order to face life.
author: Gabriel García Márquez, Love in the Time of Cholera

quote: Strength conquers weakness through force. Weakness conquers strength through seduction,the look and feel of ease, the illusion of rest without responsibility,and the hallucination of unaccountability in general.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Weakness employs many weapons in its perpetual war against strength. True strength does not attack; it is too busy enduring attacks, and defending itself against weakness.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: Your strength is beyond your own imagination.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You don't have to be strong, because the strength is in you; it's in your DNA, in your soul and your essence.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: It has often given my pleasure to observe, that independent America was not composed of detached and distant territories, but that one connected fertile, wide-spreading country was the portion of our western sons of liberty. Providence has in a particular manner blessed it with a variety of soils and productions, and watered it with innumerable streams, for the delight and accommodation of its inhabitants. A succession of navigable waters form a kind of chain round its borders, as if to bind them together; while the most noble rivers in the world, running at convenient distances, present them with highways for the easy communication of friendly aids, and the mutual transportation of their various ties. With equal pleasure I have as often taken notice, that Providence has been pleased to give us this one connected country to one united people -a people descended from the same ancestors, speaking the same language, professing the same religion, attached to the same principles of government, very similar in their manners and customs, and who, by they their joint counsels, arms, and efforts, fighting side by side throughout a long and bloody war, have nobly established general liberty and independence.
author: John Jay, The Federalist Papers

quote: You know, life fractures all of us into little pieces. It harms us, but it’s how we glue those fractures back together that makes us stronger.
author: Carrie Jones, Entice

quote: Your suffering is here to help you unfold and to awaken into compassion, love and strength.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: In your serenity there is a clarity, strength and correctness that is beyond the petty scuffles of the moment — a greater truth. It is the truth of who you are; beautiful, calm, secure, open, willing and safe.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
category: beauty, calmness, clarity, correctness, greatness, safety, serenity, spirituality, strength, truth

quote: I know I have the body of a weak, feeble woman; but I have the heart and stomach of a king
author: Elizabeth I

quote: I believe in love. I believe it transforms, transports, and transcends. I believe it fine-tunes goodness, solidifies strength, ripens resolve, eradicates rage, alleviates stress, and elevates empathy.
author: Lisa Kogan
category: belief, empathy, goodness, love, resolve, strength, stress

quote: A man has the strength to face what he is thrown in life. If he falls or is beaten, he does not complain but gets up and rides in to face the challenge once more.
author: Cheryl Matthynssens, The Blackguard

quote: It takes strong, sound leadership, that correspondingly rare commodity, which is afflicted with neither an excess of pity nor callousness, to stand against the insipid tide of superficiality that is sweeping the world.
author: Tim Macartney-Snape

quote: Your will has to be stronger than your excuses. Your will has to be stronger than your fear.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Your pain is a divine rite of passage through which you will be reborn as a being of strength, wisdom and purpose.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: To move forth and grab your destiny is admirable. To shape your own future with the strength in your fist is beyond that.
author: S.A. Bouraleh

quote: Life is ever reaching for strength, vitality, survival and the fulfillment of perpetuating its inherent message of continuance.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life
category: continuance, fullfillment, life, messages, perpetration, strength, survivalism, vitality

quote: You will not be the same after the storms of life; you will be stronger, wiser and more alive than ever before!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: You have the heart of a warrior and you were designed to survive!
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: He reached out a long arm and drew me in, holding me close against him. I put my arms around him and felt the quiver of his muscles, exhausted, and the sheer hard strength still in him, that would hold him up, no matter how tired he might be. We stood quite still for some time, my cheek against his chest and his face against my hair, drawing strength from each other for whatever might come next. Being married.
author: Diana Gabaldon, Written in My Own Heart's Blood

quote: Until then we're going to keep making memories like this, moments when we're the only two people in the whole world. And when we get scared or lonely or confused, we'll pull out these memories and wrap them around us and they'll make us feel safe. And strong.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson, The Impossible Knife of Memory
category: coping, encouragement, loneliness, memories, safe, scared, strength

quote: I can still make a fist, and breath still burns in my chest. So look at my face. Look at my mortal soul, and remember it. You did not crush me, and you will have the rest of eternity to think on it.
author: Susan Dennard, Strange and Ever After

quote: Real strength isn’t control. It’s knowing when to let go.
author: Christopher Barzak, The Love We Share Without Knowing

quote: The self-esteem one acquires and a well-earned feeling of one's strength are the only consolation in this world. Income, after all, most brutes have that.
author: Paul Gauguin, The Writings of a Savage

quote: We shall become, or we shall overcome.
author: Anthony Liccione
category: become, come-to-be, endure, obstacles, overcome, settle, strength

quote: Waiting with hope is very difficult, but true patience is expressed when we must even wait for hope. I will have reached the point of greatest strength once I have learned to wait for hope." George Matheson
author: George Matheson

quote: Never underestimate the collective strength of your weakest connections.
author: Ryan Lilly, #Networking is people looking for people looking for people

quote: Be the Kind of Woman that when Your Feet Hit the Floor Each Morning, the Devil Says, ‘Oh Crap, She’s Up!
author: Anonymous

quote: Rather than assuming weakness or defectiveness, we should acknowledge that getting through depression requires considerable strength. Rather than assuming permanent debility, we should recognize that some depressions are followed by thriving.
author: Jonathan Rottenberg, The Depths: The Evolutionary Origins of the Depression Epidemic

quote: There were times my heart broke into painful fragments then my soul perseveringly gathered an ocean of strength on my voyage towards renewal.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Meet struggle and master it, says nature, and you shall have strength and wisdom sufficient for all your needs.
author: Napoleon Hill, You Can Work Your Own Miracles

quote: He lay still, his bloodshot eyes staring blankly before him, and drifted into dreams of his problems, compulsively living out dialogues, summing up emotional scenes with his mother, Dot, and his friends. Repeatedly he chided himself to go to sleep, but it did no good, for he was hungry for these waking visions that depicted his dilemmas, yet he knew that such brooding did not help; in fact he was wasting his waning strength, for into these unreal dramas he was putting the whole of his ardent being. The long hours dragged on.
author: Richard Wright, The Outsider

quote: If it's about the strength, every big animal can catch any mouse... but the skillful brand of the cat makes it's catch exceptional! Go, get the skills!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
category: animal, be-skilled, big, big-animal, brand, cat, cat-and-mouse, catch, excel, excellent, exceptional, food-for-thought, israelmore-ayivor, learn, mouse, skillful, skillfulness, skills, strength, strong, unique

quote: It's these small differences in people's karma that determine if we get up or remain lying on the ground.
author: Peter Høeg, The Quiet Girl
category: determination, determine, differences, fall, getting-up, ground, karma, lying-down, people, small, strength

quote: It takes some strength to fight. It takes greater strength to choose not to fight.
author: Philip Gerard Oning

quote: I've never believed in living for the ones you love. I believe in the power of death, I'd die for the ones that I love.
author: Anna Van Breugel
category: books, death, friendship, inspiration, love, strength

quote: Moments of prayer intruded on by sloth cannot be made up. We may get experience, but we cannot get back the rich freshness and strength which were wrapped up in those moments.
author: Frederick W. Robertson

quote: Strength, both physical and spiritual, is the product of struggle!
author: Napoleon Hill, You Can Work Your Own Miracles

quote: Hope. It is the quintessential human delusion, simultaneously the source of your greatest strength, and greatest weakness.
author: Unknown or The Archictect from the Matrix reloaded movie

quote: Your castles and strongholds shall have bars of iron and bronze, and as your day, so shall your strength, your rest and security, be.” Deuteronomy 33:25 AMP
author: Anonymous, Deuteronomy

quote: Well, I am sure, for we do not achieve this by ourselves, but by the strength of StarClan within us.
author: Erin Hunter, Moonrise
category: cinderpelt, leafpaw, moonrise, starclan, strength, warriors

quote: When you carry someone else's baggage, it's nearly impossible to get rid of your own. Drop it. Now.
author: Cathryn Louis

quote: He's the strongest man in the w
author: Astrid Lindgren, Pippi Longstocking

quote: You are entitled to your opinion but you are not entitled to dictate mine.
author: Michelle N. Onuorah
category: conviction, faith, freedom, inspirational, opinion, opinions-of-others, strength

quote: People will tell you that you’re broken. Don’t believe them. They were not the person that could help you. They have not walked your path. God has got a plan to bring people into your life that have lived through a similar hell. In the end, it isn’t the number of people that are on your side. It is the people that understand what your side is that matters.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: answers, broken, faith, guardian-angel, have-faith, hell-to-well, hope, love, mental-disorders, pray, prayer, stay-strong, strength, trust

quote: Clary saw him take Mark's hand; he pressed his witchlight into the boy's palm, where it flickered, and then resumed its steady glow. 'Take this with you,' said Jace, 'for it can be dark in the land under the hill, and the years very long.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Heavenly Fire

quote: Fire can destroy or purify, strengthen or weaken, all depending on the nature of the material being burned. Pain has the same effects on the human soul, and for the same reasons.
author: Lance Conrad, The Price of Creation

quote: Once you commit and decide that there is no turning back, you’ll find the strength.
author: Marta Mrotek, Miracle in Progress: A Handbook for Holistic Recovery
category: commitment, decisions, hope, inspiration, recovery, strength

quote: If I'm able to use my voice to do good in the world then I definitely want to do that.
author: Demi Lovato
category: demi-lovato, good, message, outspoken, strength, voice

quote: ...I hope that simple love and truth will be strong in the end. I hope that real love and truth are stronger in the end than any evil or misfortune in the world.
author: Charles Dickens, David Copperfield

quote: Part of the strength of science is that it has tended to attract individuals who love knowledge and the creation of it. ... Thus, it is the communication process which is at the core of the vitality and integrity of science.
author: Philip Abelson
category: attraction, communication, creation, integrity, knowledge, love, process, science, strength, vitality

quote: Every day, strive to refine your contagious shine, and shake the nonsense offered by those who lack the will to polish-up from within.
author: T.F. Hodge, From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
category: glow, nonsense, refine, refined, refinement, shine, shine-bright, strength, strength-of-character, will, will-power

quote: Arrogance convinced me that by sheer determination, I could conquer helplessness itself. Stubborn and foolish youth, I must admit, for when I look back on those years now, I see quite clearly that rarely did I stand alone. Always there were friends, true and dear, lending me support even when I believed I did not want it, and even when I did not realize they were doing it. ...These were the companions who justified my principles, who gave me strength to continue against any foe, real or imagined. These were the companions who fought the helplessness, the rage, and frustration. These were the friends who gave me my life.
author: R.A. Salvatore

quote: God doesn't mock us. He never gives us a goal that we cannot accomplish in His strength. I want to assure you, you can glorify God, you MUST glorify God. But you have to determine deep within your heart that you're going to do it His way.
author: Charles R. Swindoll, Rise & Shine: A Wake Up Call

quote: Do you feel like your action plans are stronger to than your capability? Just take a moment a draw a plan of how to deal with the difficult task with a single bite at each time. Go slow, but sure!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
category: action-plans, actions, bite, capability, capable, day-by-day, deal, difficult, difficulty, draw-a-plan, feel, go-slow, israelmore-ayivor, little, make-a-deal, make-a-plan, moment, plan-your-life, plans, single, single-bite, small-small, strength, strong, stronger, strongest, sure, tasks

quote: The most important part of discernment is pinpointing the forces to be reckoned with, both the constructive and destructive.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: constructive, destructive, discernment, force, force-to-be-reckoned-with, judgment, pinpoint, strength

quote: All thinking things fear. Sentience, perhaps, is facing that fear and conquering it rather than succumbing. A tiger will drown in a tar pit, but a man who can clear his thoughts may survive.
author: C.E. Murphy, Hands of Flame

quote: Roar to your own beat!
author: Janet Autherine, Growing into Greatness with God: 7 Paths to Greatness for our Sons and Daughters

quote: Challenge each problem you face with purposeful thought and determined action. Resolve that 'every' situation you encounter will make you better, stronger, wiser, more skillful and more loving.
author: Steve Brunkhorst
category: asttitude, growth, love, problems, skill, strength, wisdom

quote: The men at the top aren't that great at properly assessing the women under them, certainly not enough to gauge their potential or intestinal fortitude.
author: Charlotte Beers, I'd Rather Be in Charge: A Legendary Business Leader's Roadmap for Achieving Pride, Power, and Joy at Work

quote: Be strong. It is our adversity that leads us to our character.
author: Jennifer Megan Varnadore

quote: Xavier stares past her with watery eyes. 'Why does the world feel the need to drop its weight upon my shoulders?' he barely whispers. His mother strokes his hair.'Maybe it believes you can handle it,' she tells him. 'That though it is heavy, you are strong enough to carry it.
author: Damiana, Untitled
category: carry, heavy, meredith, mother, shoulders, strength, strong, weight, world, xavier

quote: Fighting physically signifies spiritual weakness.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson, Classic Quotations From The Otherworlds
category: combat, fight, fighting, insecurity, materialism, spirit, spiritual-battle, spirituality, strength, weakness

quote: Sometimes life is not kind, and most times we have to hurt deeply in order to find out how strong and determined we really are.
author: Yara Greathouse, Unavoidable

quote: My mother wasn't a fool," I say. "She just understood something you didn't. That it's not sacrifice if it's someone else's life you're giving away, it's just evil."I back up another step and say, "She taught me all about real sacrifice. That it should be done from love, not misplaced disgust for another person's genetics. That it should be done from necessity, not without exhausting all other options. That it should be done for people who need your strength because they don't have enough of their own. ...
author: Veronica Roth, Allegiant
category: allegiant, love, sacrifice, strength, tris, veronica-roth

quote: Love is when unknowingly I am moving to a world of no return, Where my desire and your fragrance together burnall your thoughts in canvas of my mind and soulturns in to a masterpiece as my life's aim and goal looks I am taken over and over away by you showering in me as a rain of you and only you
author: Seema Gupta
category: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, divine-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, lonely, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: If you take a hard look at the people in your life, you may be blown away by how many explorers and survivalists surround you. Everyday, I'm amazed by the number of people I meet, who have climbed Mt. Everest, time and time again...without ever having been to the Himalayas.
author: José N. Harris, Mi Vida
category: challenge, courage, endurance, hardship, strength, strength-through-adversity

quote: Prayer is only another name for good, clean, direct thinking. When you pray, think well what you are saying, and make your thoughts into things that are solid. In that manner, your prayer will have strength, and that strength shall become part of you, mind, body, and spirit.
author: Richard Llewellyn, How Green Was My Valley

quote: You augment your strength every time you overcome obstacles. Discover and use that unique potential you have in coping well in a positive way no matter how worst the situation can be.
author: Angelica Hopes, Landscapes of a Heart, Whispers of a Soul

quote: Who am I? They often tell me I would step from my cell's confinement calmly, cheerfully, firmly, like a squire from his country-house.Who am I? They often tell me I would talk to my warden freely and friendly and clearly, as though it were mine to command.Who am I? They also tell me I would bear the days of misfortune equably, smilingly, proudly, like one accustomed to win.Am I then really all that which other men tell of, or am I only what I know of myself, restless and longing and sick, like a bird in a cage, struggling for breath, as though hands were compressing my throat, yearning for colors, for flowers, for the voices of birds, thirsting for words of kindness, for neighborliness, trembling with anger at despotisms and petty humiliation, tossing in expectation of great events, powerlessly trembling for friends at an infinite distance, weary and empty at praying, at thinking, at making, faint and ready to say farewell to it all.Who am I? This or the other? Am I one person today, and tomorrow another? Am I both at once? A hypocrite before others, and before myself a contemptibly woebegone weakling? Or is something within me still like a beaten army, fleeing in disorder from victory already achieved?Who am I? They mock me, these lonely questions of mine.Whoever I am, Thou knowest, O God, I am thine!
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Prison Poems
category: depression, god, life, loneliness, longing, meaning, sadness, strength, weakness, woebegone

quote: To be at peace, does not mean that you are amiss of every storm, it only means that you can find a calm within the storm.
author: Tania Elizabeth, The Tier of Eternal Grace: The Souls Cry

quote: Even the strongest, most well-built team will, at times, be met with adversity.  What makes us great is not that we should anticipate less adversity the stronger that we become, but rather that in anticipation of adversity we become stronger.”  -Michael Joling
author: Michael Joling

quote: Strength?” “Safety,” I said. And in that moment I realized that I’d always equated the two in my head, but they weren’t the same thing. Sometimes people were strongest at their most vulnerable, dangerous moments.
author: Kate Avery Ellison, Frost

quote: Someone's weaknesses are the strength which allows them to be human.
author: M (Michelle) Carithers

quote: Nietzsche was the one who did the job for me. At a certain moment in his life,the idea came to him of what he called 'the love of your fate.' Whatever your fate is, whatever the hell happens, you say, 'This is what I need.' It may look like a wreck, but go at it as though it were an opportunity, a challenge. If you bring love to that moment--not discouragement--you will find the strength is there. Any disaster you can survive is an improvement in your character, your stature, and your life. What a privilege! This is when the spontaneity of your own nature will have a chance to flow.Then, when looking back at your life, you will see that the moments which seemed to be great failures followed by wreckage were the incidents that shaped the life you have now. You’ll see that this is really true. Nothing can happen to you that is not positive. Even though it looks and feels at the moment like a negative crisis, it is not. The crisis throws you back, and when you are required to exhibit strength, it comes.
author: Joseph Campbell, A Joseph Campbell Companion: Reflections on the Art of Living
category: acceptance, fate, growth, life, love, nietzsche, positivity, strength

quote: Control is the basis of all true power. Authority and strength are matters of perception
author: Brandon Sanderson, Words of Radiance
category: authority, control, jasnah-kholin, perception, power, strength

quote: Dare to be strong and courageous. That is the road. Venture anything. Be brave enough to dare to be loved.
author: Sherwood Anderson, Winesburg, Ohio

quote: Love is An invited deal for losing peace
author: Seema Gupta
category: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: My Mother - AmmaHer touch was my solace,Her smile did encourage,Her love was my strength,Her stare, I fully decant,Her care was my power,Her joy was my shower,Her anger corrected my path,Her laughter filled my heart,Her silence made me ponder,Her glare was my reminder,Her scorn corrected my track,Her embrace I never did lack.
author: Munindra Misra, Chants of Hindu Gods and Godesses in English Rhyme
category: embrace, emotion, encourage, heart, love, mother, power, reminder, solace, strength

quote: It's her ability as an artist to see possibility where others see a blank page and, by extension, to see victory where others see certain defeat that truly empowers her...
author: Sarah Cross, Shadowhunters and Downworlders: A Mortal Instruments Reader

quote: It is one thing to be brave in front of others, perhaps for fear of being branded a coward and becoming diminished in their eyes, but another entirely to be brave when there is nobody to witness your courage. The latter is an elemental bravery, a strength of spirit and character.
author: John Connolly, The Infernals
category: brave, bravery, character, courage, courageous, strength, strength-of-character, strong

quote: the power to cause pain is the only power that matters, the power to kill and destroy, because if you can't kill then you are always subject to those who can, and nothing and one will ever save you.
author: Orson Scott Card, Ender's Game

quote: It takes courage to speak up for your beliefs.
author: Jim George
category: beliefs, blessed, christian, courage, courageous, faith, god, mature, speak, speak-up, strength, strong, take

quote: At times it may feel hopeless. That life is unforgiving. Breathe. In the hopelessness of life, we find hope and promise. We find strength.
author: Tania Elizabeth, The Tier of Eternal Grace: The Moon Clearing
category: hope, inspiration, inspirational-quote, promise, strength, truth

quote: Sometimes we have to dig a little deeper, to reach a little higher.
author: A.C. Anderson

quote: Confidence is that internal alignment between what you know, what you believe and what you portray.
author: Todd Stocker, Leading from the Gut: 3 Power Principles of Effective Leaders
category: character, confidence, inspirational, integrity, motivational, strength

quote: When the fuel is dried up in a vehicle, it stops driving automatically. You are a vehicle in the spiritual and the physical world, so you need some oil for alacrity, in order to get to your destination. The greater the quantity of your oil, the more you cover the distance, and the more you cover the distance, the closer you get to your success.

quote: Divine love""Don't Leave me, ONLYTo carry my body on my two feet I need you
author: Seema Gupta
category: attributed-no-source, broken-heart, deep-love, divine-love, friends, heartbreak, inspirational, life, lonely, love, passion, passionate-love, strength

quote: Fate refuses to stop at the pretty part of the tale; Fate insists on more tests of courage and wit, a terrible end, even if the heroine's heart be pure and her crime accidental.
author: Susann Cokal, The Kingdom of Little Wounds

quote: Rise up, empower yourself and take a step. The only way to know that you still have some amount of strength in you when you fall is to attempt to rise up. However if you believe you don't have any strength, you will remain where you are!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
category: amount, attempt, belief, believe, empower, empowerment, fall, food-for-thought, israelmore-ayivor, know, powerful, remain-where-you-are, rise-again, rise-up, still, strength, take-a-step, way, you-are-empowered, you-are-powerful, yourself

quote: Recovery itself is a very un-glamorous daily process of being willing to fall down again, to break again, to cry again, to get up and try yet again until ‘success’ manifests as ever-greater sustained healing.
author: Shannon Cutts, Beating Ana: How to Outsmart Your Eating Disorder and Take Your Life Back

quote: Gain strength through adversity…!
author: James A. Murphy, The Waves of Life Quotes and Daily Meditations

quote: Revealing of origin , evidence the existence of hidden pearls in mind which is addicted to imagine and thought as well.
author: Seema Gupta

quote: In my life, I have but one anchor and that anchor is my God. I think if you look closely enough, you can even see it in my eyes, you'll see a strong place, an anchor. That is God.
author: C. JoyBell C.

author: Munindra Misra, Devi Mahatmayam in English Rhyme
